definition: universities and colleges/abbr. for 高等學校|高等学校

sentences.english: This paper talks about related problems with campus culture construction in higher institutes .
sentences.chinese: 本文对高校校园文化建设的相关问题加以论述。

sentences.english: The geographical field exercitation is an important part of the geographical teaching process in universities.
sentences.chinese: 地理野外实习是高校地理教学过程中的重要教学环节。

sentences.english: The successful development of private colleges depends on its good ope rational mechanism.
sentences.chinese: 民办高校的顺利发展有赖于自身运行机制的完善。

sentences.english: Most colleges do not pay energy to promote cheerleading publicly.
sentences.chinese: 大多数高校甚至没有对啦啦操做任何宣传。

sentences.english: Third, analysis the problems and cause on the building of the contingent of teachers in private colleges.
sentences.chinese: 对民办高校教师队伍建设存在的问题和原因进行分析。

sentences.english: The second part is the concrete research for the university student class cadre's competence.
sentences.chinese: 第二部分是对高校学生班干部胜任力的具体研究。

sentences.english: Fund shortage restricts the development of col leges and universities.
sentences.chinese: 资金短缺是制约高校发展的主要原因。

sentences.english: Electronic party affairs are a new method to strengthen the party construction in colleges in the new era.
sentences.chinese: 电子党务是新时期加强高校党建的全新载体。

sentences.english: Library is an important composition part of teaching and scientific research in college and university.
sentences.chinese: 高等学校图书馆是高校教学科研工作的重要组成郑分。

sentences.english: Press publicity is an important aspect of ideological and political work in colleges and universities.
sentences.chinese: 新闻宣传是高校思想政治工作的重要方面。

sentences.english: Therefore, the ideological work of college teachers is an arduous task with great significance.
sentences.chinese: 高校教师思想政治工作任务艰巨，意义重大。

sentences.english: The university teachers shoulder for the society raise the qualified professional personnel's important mission.
sentences.chinese: 高校教师肩负为社会培养合格专门人才的重要使命。

sentences.english: Becoming and excellent college teacher remains a goal to me.
sentences.chinese: 成为一名优秀的高校教师一直是我的奋斗目标。

sentences.english: The agency has partnered with key colleges and universities to offer degree programs in this field.
sentences.chinese: 该学院部门与重点高校合作共同授予学生学位。

sentences.english: Another was a college man , but he began in the boiler room .
sentences.chinese: 另一种是高校的男子，但他开始在锅炉房。

sentences.english: Introduction of electronic registration of university enrollment is the inevitable choice in the new situation.
sentences.chinese: 新形势下实施电子注册是高校学籍管理的必然选择。

definition: the Great Learning, one of the Four Books 四書|四书[Si4 shu1] in Confucianism
Peking University (abbr. for 北京大學|北京大学)
